name.en: Reconstruction and Simulation of Land Use and Land Cover Changes
name.ch: 土地利用與地表覆蓋之重建與模擬

department.ch: 水文與海洋科學研究所碩士班
department.en: MSc in Hydrologocal and  Oceanic Sciences

goal.ch:
1.人類歷史與探索地球的歷程
2.建構一個試驗性的土地使用變化模式
3.局地土地利用對全球環境改變的衝擊
4.遙測技術運用在地表覆蓋變化之偵測
goal.en:
1. An overall picture of human history on exploring the land of Earth
2. The impact of local land-use changes on the global environment
3. Advance in science development for reconstructing the past land-use and land-cover
4. Using remote sensing technique to identify land use and land cover changes

outline.ch: 期望以人類文明發展的角度觀察人類活動對於地球環境所產生的影響，其中包含: 人類文明與不同時、空尺度的介紹、植被與氣候之關聯、地質年代與地表覆蓋之重建、局地土地利用改變對全球環境之衝擊以及科學進展對於重建歷史地表覆蓋的貢獻。課程規劃期中考之前探討萬年以前的時間尺度、期中考以後探討近代約300年的時間尺度。預期將引導學生了解如何建構一個試驗性的土地覆蓋變化模式。課程中將介紹土地使用變化模型的發展史與相關核心概念與構想，其中包含：自動細胞機(Cellular Automaton)、邱念(von Thunen)土地經濟理論與馬可夫練(Markov Chain)等。最後，課程將會引入衛星觀測資料並介紹如何運用衛星資料反演地表的覆蓋狀況。
outline.en: The course was designed for students who interested in understanding the relationship between human history and environmental changes (e.g., land-use and land-cover changes). Two distinctive time scales, millennia and the latest 300-years, were selected to have a different look at the impact of land-use and land-cover changes on the human life. The following topics: human history and scales, vegetation growth and climate, and reconstruction of historical land-cover/land-use and geological dating, and impact of land-use and land-cover changes on the global environment, were included in this lecture. Key concepts for modeling LULCC, including Cellular Automata, the von Thunen ecmonic theory, and Markov chain, will be also introduced in this lecture. Finally, we will explore the use of remote semnsing technique to retrieve land use and land cover data from the satellite observations.
